get.description: List all the bank account of the connected account

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Card Token or Bank account Token

parameters.name: external_account_id
parameters.description: Card ID or Bank account ID

parameters.name: external_account_id
parameters.description: Card ID or Bank account ID

parameters.name: external_account_id
parameters.description: Card ID or Bank account ID

parameters.name: default_for_currency
parameters.description: For card and bank_account.When set to true, this becomes the default external account for its currency

parameters.name: account_holder_name
parameters.description: For band_account. The name of the person or business that owns the bank account

parameters.name: account_holder_type
parameters.description: For band_account. The type of entity that holds the account. This can be either individual or company.

parameters.name: address_country
parameters.description: For card. Billing address country, if provided when creating card.

parameters.name: address_line1
parameters.description: For card. Address line 1 (Street address/PO Box/Company name).

parameters.name: address_zip
parameters.description: For card. ZIP or postal code.

parameters.name: exp_month
parameters.description: For card. Two digit number representing the card’s expiration month

parameters.name: exp_year
parameters.description: For card. Four digit number representing the card’s expiration year.

get.summary: List all payments methods of a user

post.summary: Add a new payments method to a user

get.description: Retrieve a specific payments method by his ID.

delete.description: Delete a payments method only if the payments method is not the default payments method.

get.description: Retrieve a token by his Id.

parameters.name: percent_ownership
parameters.description: Percent ownership of the company if owner

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The country in which the bank account is located.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: The currency the bank account is in. This must be a country/currency pairing that Stripe supports.

parameters.name: account_holder_name
parameters.description: The name of the person or business that owns the bank account.

parameters.name: account_holder_type
parameters.description: The type of entity that holds the account. This can be either individual or company.

parameters.name: account_number
parameters.description: The account number for the bank account, in string form. Must be a checking account.

parameters.name: exp_month
parameters.description: Two-digit number representing the card's expiration month.

parameters.name: exp_year
parameters.description: Two- or four-digit number representing the card's expiration year.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The card number, as a string without any separators.

parameters.name: cvc
parameters.description: Card security code. Highly recommended to always include this value, but it's required only for accounts based in European countries.

parameters.name: address_line1
parameters.description: Address line 1 (Street address / PO Box / Company name).
